description:
\begin{description}
\item
K. Bardakci, {\sl ``Dual Models and Spontaneous Symmetry
Breaking,''} {\sl Nucl.~Phys.} {\bf B68} (1974) 331;
\item
K.Bardakci and M.B.Halpern, {\sl ``Explicit Spontaneous Breakdown
in a Dual Model,''} {\sl  Phys.~Rev.} {\bf D10} (1974) 4230;
\item
K.Bardakci and M.B.Halpern, {\sl ``Explicit Spontaneous Breakdown
in a Dual Model II: N Point Functions,''} {\sl Nucl.~Phys.} {\bf B96} (1975) 285;
\item
K.Bardakci, {\sl ``Spontaneous Symmetry Breakdown in the Standard
Dual String Model,''} {\sl Nucl.~Phys.} {\bf B133} (1978) 297.
\

\begin{description}
\item  E.~Witten,
  {\sl ``On Background Independent Open String Field Theory''},
  {\sl  Phys.~Rev.} {\bf D46} (1992) 5467, {\tt hep-th/9208027};
  {\sl ``Some Computations in Background Independent Off-Shell String
    Theory''},
  {\sl  Phys.~Rev.} {\bf D47} (1993) 3405, {\tt hep-th/9210065};
\item  K.~Li and E.~Witten,
  {\sl ``Role of Short Distance Behavior in Off-Shell Open String
    Field Theory''},
  {\sl  Phys.~Rev.} {\bf D48} (1993) 853, {\tt hep-th/9303067};
\item  S.~Shatashvili,
  {\sl ``Comment on The Background Independent Open String Theory''},
  {\sl Phys.~Lett.} {\bf B311} (1993) 83, {\tt hep-th/9303143};
  {\sl ``On The Problems with Background Independence in String
    Theory''}, {\tt hep-th/9311177};
\item  A.~A.~Gerasimov and S.~L.~Shatashvili,
  {\sl ``On Exact Tachyon Potential in Open String Field Theory''},
  {\sl JHEP} {\bf 0010} (2000) 034, {\tt hep-th/0009103};
\item  D.~Ghoshal and A.~Sen,
    {\sl ``Normalization of the Background Independent Open String Field
         Theory Action''}, {\sl JHEP} {\bf 0011} (2000) 021,
   {\tt hep-th/0009191};
\item
  M.~Marino,     {\sl ``On the BV formulation of boundary superstring
    field theory''}, {\sl JHEP} {\bf 0106} (2001) 059,
   {\tt hep-th/0103089};
\item  V.~Niarchos and N.~Prezas,
    {\sl ``Boundary Superstring Field Theory''},
  {\sl Nucl.~Phys.} {\bf B619} (2001) 51, {\tt hep-th/0103102};
\item
  O.~ Andreev,
  {\sl ``Some Computations of Partition Functions and Tachyon
    Potentials in Background Independent Off-Shell String Theory''},
  {\sl Nucl.~Phys.} {\bf B598} (2001) 151,   {\tt hep-th/0010218}.
\item
  A.~A.~Tseytlin,
  {\sl ``Sigma model approach to string theory effective actions with
    tachyons''}, {\sl J.Math.Phy42} {\bf 42} (2001) 2854,
{\tt hep-th/0011033}.
\

\begin{description}
\item  D. Kutasov, M.~Marino and G.~Moore,
  {\sl ``Some Exact Results on Tachyon Condensation in String Field
    Theory''},
   {\sl JHEP} {\bf 0010} (2000) 045, {\tt hep-th/0009148};
\item
  S.~Moriyama and S.~Nakamura,
  {\sl ``Descent Relation of Tachyon Condensation from Boundary String
    Field Theory''},
  {\sl Phys.~Lett.} {\bf B506} (2001) 161,
  {\tt hep-th/0011002};
\

\begin{description}
\item  D.~Kutasov, M.~Marino and G.~Moore,
  {\sl ``Remarks on Tachyon Condensation in Superstring Field
    Theory''},
  {\tt  hep-th/0010108};
\item  P.~Kraus and F.~Larsen,
  {\sl ``Boundary String Field Theory of the D$\bar{\it D}$ System''},
  {\sl  Phys.~Rev.} {\bf D63} (2001) 106004,
  {\tt hep-th/0012198};
\item
  T.~Takayanagi, S.~Terashima and T.~Uesugi,
  {\sl ``Brane-Antibrane Action from Boundary String Field Theory''},
  {\sl JHEP} {\bf 0103} (2001) 019,
  {\tt hep-th/0012210}.
\

\begin{description}
\item
P.~Yi, {\sl ``Membranes from Fives-Branes and Fundamental Strings
from Dp Branes,''} {\sl Nucl.~Phys.} {\bf B550} (1999) 214, {\tt hep-th/9901159}.
\item
O.~Bergman, K.~Hori and P.~Yi, {\sl ``Confinement on the
Brane,''} {\sl Nucl.~Phys.} {\bf B580} (2000) 289, {\tt hep-th/0002223}.
